name: Baseball Game (No Helmet)
description:
For Stop Waiting For Godot Jam

Headphones will help, makes it easier to tell which side of the screen balls will be coming from.

CONTROLS
Movement: Arrow Keys/WASD

Jump: Space

Swing: Shift

Plan to go back to the start screen in the future and polish it up. I got distracted reading the docs and messing around with Godot's UI library and didn't end up implementing much in the end.

All Art, Code, and Music by me. 

All Sound effects are from free to use sound effects packs.
